name: HanaGold
description: HanaGold Token is a token issued by HanaGold Jewelry Joint Stock Company. When owning HNG, investors will enjoy a lot of benefits from HanaGold's product and service policy including priority on care, preferential policies for VIP members, reduced jewelry processing fees, receiving commissions for distribution products, preferential rates for opening franchised showrooms... HNG's mission is to be a bridge for domestic and international investors to have the opportunity to invest in the jewelry industry in Vietnam, overcome difficulties of traditional business and make breakthroughs with 4.0 technology.
